t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    N = int(input())
    A = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    sum = 0
    for ele in A:
        sum = sum + ele
    sumfinal = sum - len(A) + 1
    print(sumfinal)
    t -= 1

from sys import stdin
stdint = lambda : int(stdin.readline())
seq = lambda : list(map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split()))
for _ in range(stdint()):
    n = stdint()
    total = sum(seq())
    print(total - n + 1)

from functools import reduce
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    print(reduce(lambda x, y: x + y, map(int, input().split())) - n + 1)

    t -= 1
